ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
From the Realm Beyond the Mist, the Warpigs mass, ready to invade the Modern World of Man. Azure, the Dark Elf, stands at the head of the army, poised to give the attack command! Tarot, Raven Hex, and their Mother, chained and helpless, can do nothing but watch in horror!
